imdb.plot outline: A special summer series developed in conjunction with the Spa Resort Casino in downtown Palm Springs, Red Hot Date was filmed in front of a live audience and featured a Dating Game style game show with some wild modern twists. After the game, cameras then followed the winners for special "date" episodes of the show. The shows aired in Summer of 2012 on Palm Springs' Retro station, KRET-TV 14.
imdb.title: Red Hot Date
plot: A special summer series developed in conjunction with the Spa Resort Casino in downtown Palm Springs, _Red Hot Date_ (qv) was filmed in front of a live audience and featured a Dating Game style game show with some wild modern twists. After the game, cameras then followed the winners for special "date" episodes of the show. The shows aired in Summer of 2012 on Palm Springs' Retro station, KRET-TV 14.::Valerie Wells
